title: Send or update new Mailchimp subscribers in HubSpot
author: n8n Team
readme:
This workflow sends new Mailchimp subscribers to HubSpot as new or updated contacts.

## Prerequisites

  * Mailchimp account and [Mailchimp credentials](https://docs.n8n.io/integrations/builtin/credentials/mailchimp/)
  * HubSpot account and [HubSpot credentials](https://docs.n8n.io/integrations/builtin/credentials/hubspot/)



## How it works

  1. Cron node triggers this workflow every day at 7:00.
  2. Mailchimp node searches for new subscribers.
  3. New Mailchimp subscribes get sent to HubSpot.
  4. HubSpot node either updates the existing contact or adds a new one to the pipeline.
readme_html:
This workflow sends new Mailchimp subscribers to HubSpot as new or updated contacts.

Prerequisites

  • Mailchimp account and Mailchimp credentials
  • HubSpot account and HubSpot credentials

How it works

  1. Cron node triggers this workflow every day at 7:00.
  2. Mailchimp node searches for new subscribers.
  3. New Mailchimp subscribes get sent to HubSpot.
  4. HubSpot node either updates the existing contact or adds a new one to the pipeline.
readme_zh:
该工作流将Mailchimp的新订阅用户作为新增或更新联系人发送至HubSpot。

## 前置条件

  * 需拥有Mailchimp账户及[Mailchimp凭证](https://docs.n8n.io/integrations/builtin/credentials/mailchimp/)
  * 需拥有HubSpot账户及[HubSpot凭证](https://docs.n8n.io/integrations/builtin/credentials/hubspot/)

## 运作流程

  1. Cron节点每日7:00定时触发该工作流  
  2. Mailchimp节点检索新增订阅用户  
  3. 将Mailchimp新订阅用户发送至HubSpot  
  4. HubSpot节点将更新现有联系人或向销售管道添加新联系人
title_zh: 在HubSpot中发送或更新新的Mailchimp订阅者
